# Borderless Vision
A Forge mod that replaces Minecraft's default fullscreen mode with a borderless fullscreen window.

This mod replaces Minecraft's default fullscreen mode with a custom borderless fullscreen mode. This is especially useful when using multiple monitors to easily switch to a program on another monitor. Minecraft's default fullscreen behavior minimizes the game when it loses focus. Thanks to this mod, the window will not minimize when switching to another program. Additionally, other windows can be placed on top of the Minecraft window.

## Installation
Installing this mod is easy, just follow these steps:

1. Find your mods folder, you can usually find it here: `C:\Users\{YOUR USERNAME}\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\mods`
2. Place the downloaded .jar file in the folder
3. That's it! The window should now automatically become borderless when switching to full screen (i.e. pressing F11 or activating full screen mode in Video Settings). Have a nice game! :D

**Make sure you have installed Forge or NeoForge!**
